chart.name: Network Bytes Out vs 24hr Change %
chart.programText:
B = data('Network Out', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), rollup='average').publish(label='B')
C = (B).mean().publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (C).timeshift('1d').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (C/D-1).scale(100).publish(label='E')

chart.description: Total number of credits consumed by the Virtual Machine. Applicable to burstable vms.
chart.name: CPU Credits Consumed
chart.programText: A = data('CPU Credits Consumed', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true')).publish(label='A')

chart.name: CPU % Trend
chart.programText: A = data('Percentage CPU', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Disk I/O Trend
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Bytes', filter=filter('aggregation_type', 'total'), rollup='average').publish(label='A')
B = data('Disk Write Bytes', filter=filter('aggregation_type', 'total'), rollup='average', extrapolation='last_value').publish(label='B')

chart.name: Disk I/O
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Operations/Sec', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true')).mean(by=['sf_metric']).publish(label='A')
B = data('Disk Write Operations/Sec', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true')).mean(by=['sf_metric']).publish(label='B')
C = data('Disk Write Bytes', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), rollup='average').mean(by=['sf_metric']).publish(label='C')
D = data('Disk Read Bytes', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), rollup='average').mean(by=['sf_metric']).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Disk IOPs Trend
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Operations/Sec', filter=filter('aggregation_type', 'average'), extrapolation='zero').publish(label='A')
B = data('Disk Write Operations/Sec', filter=filter('aggregation_type', 'average')).publish(label='B')

chart.description: Total number of credits available to burst. Applicable to burstable vms.
chart.name: CPU Credits Remaining
chart.programText: A = data('CPU Credits Remaining', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true')).publish(label='A')

chart.name: CPU %
chart.programText: A = data('Percentage CPU', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Network Bytes In vs 24hr Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('Network In', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), rollup='average').mean(by=['azure_resource_id', 'azure_resource_name']).publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B/C-1).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Top Virtual Machines by CPU%
chart.programText: A = data('Percentage CPU', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('azure_resource_id', '*') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines')).mean(by=['azure_resource_id', 'azure_resource_name']).top(count=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Network Bytes Out vs. 24h Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('Network Out', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average').sum().publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B/C - 1).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Disk Ops/Sec
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Operations/Sec', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), maxExtrapolations=5).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('Disk Write Operations/Sec', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), maxExtrapolations=5).sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Top Virtual Machines by Bytes In
chart.programText: A = data('Network In', filter=filter('azure_resource_id', '*') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['azure_resource_name', 'azure_resource_id']).top(count=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Network Bytes Out
chart.programText:
A = data('Network Out', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Top Virtual Machines by Bytes Out
chart.programText: A = data('Network Out', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average').top(count=5).mean(by=['azure_resource_name', 'azure_resource_id']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Network Bytes In
chart.programText:
A = data('Network In', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average').publish(label='A', enable=False)
C = (A).min().publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='E')
F = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='F')
G = (A).max().publish(label='G')

chart.name: Active Virtual Machines

chart.name: Network Bytes In vs. 24h Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('Network In', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average').sum().publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B/C -1).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Active Virtual Machines by Region
chart.programText: A = data('Percentage CPU', filter=filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines') and filter('azure_resource_id', '*') and filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).count(by=['azure_region']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Disk I/O Bytes/Sec
chart.programText:
A = data('Disk Read Bytes', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('Disk Write Bytes', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('Disk Read Bytes/Sec', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines')).sum().publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = data('Disk Write Bytes/Sec', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average').sum().publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (A+C).publish(label='E')
F = (B+D).publish(label='F')

chart.name: Network Bytes Out vs 24hr Change %
chart.programText:
B = data('Network Out', filter=filter('primary_aggregation_type', 'true') and filter('resource_type', 'Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines'), rollup='average').publish(label='B')
C = (B).mean().publish(label='C', enable=False)

chart.name: Network Bytes Out vs. 24h Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('^azure.vm.network.io.transmit.total').sum().publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B/C-1).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Disk I/O Bytes
chart.programText:

B = data('^azure.vm.disk.io.write.total').sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Network Bytes In vs. 24h Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('^azure.vm.network.io.receive.total').sum().publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B/C-1).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.description: percentile distribution across all active hosts
chart.name: Network Bytes In
chart.programText:
A = data('^azure.vm.network.io.receive.total').publish(label='A', enable=False)
C = (A).min().publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='E')
F = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='F')
G = (A).max().publish(label='G')

chart.description: percentile distribution across all active hosts
chart.name: CPU %
chart.programText:
A = data('^azure.vm.cpu.utilization', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Top Virtual Machines by Bytes In
chart.programText: A = data('^azure.vm.network.io.receive.total', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['azure_resource_name', 'azure_resource_id']).top(count=5).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Top Virtual Machines by Bytes Out
chart.programText: A = data('^azure.vm.network.io.transmit.total').top(count=5).mean(by=['azure_resource_name', 'azure_resource_id']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Top Mem Page Swaps/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('vmpage_io.swap.in', filter=filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm'), rollup='rate').mean(by=['aws_instance_id']).top(count=5).publish(label='A')
B = data('vmpage_io.swap.out', filter=filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm'), rollup='rate').mean(by=['aws_instance_id']).top(count=5).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Disk Metrics 24h Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('^azure.vm.disk.ops.read.total').sum().mean(over='1h').scale(60).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).timeshift('1d').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A/B-1).scale(100).publish(label='C')
D = data('^azure.vm.disk.ops.write.total').sum().mean(over='1h').scale(60).publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (D).timeshift('1d').publish(label='E', enable=False)
F = (D/E-1).scale(100).publish(label='F')
G = data('^azure.vm.disk.io.read.total').sum().mean(over='1h').scale(60).publish(label='G', enable=False)
H = (G).timeshift('1d').publish(label='H', enable=False)
I = (G/H-1).scale(100).publish(label='I')
J = data('^azure.vm.disk.io.write.total').sum().mean(over='1h').scale(60).publish(label='J', enable=False)
K = (J).timeshift('1d').publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = (J/K-1).scale(100).publish(label='L')

chart.name: Active Virtual Machines
chart.programText: A = data('^azure.vm.cpu.utilization', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).count().publish(label='A')

chart.description: percentile distribution across active hosts with agent installed
chart.name: Memory Used %
chart.programText:
A = data('memory.utilization', filter=(not filter('agent', '*')) and filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Disk Ops
chart.programText:
B = data('^azure.vm.disk.ops.write.total', maxExtrapolations=5).sum().publish(label='B')
A = data('^azure.vm.disk.ops.read.total', maxExtrapolations=5).sum().publish(label='A')

chart.name: Total Memory
chart.programText:
C = data('system.memory.usage', filter=filter('state', 'free') and filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm')).sum().publish(label='C')
F = data('system.memory.usage', filter=filter('state', 'used') and filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm')).sum().publish(label='F')
A = data('system.memory.usage', filter=filter('state', 'buffered') and filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('system.memory.usage', filter=filter('state', 'cached') and filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm')).sum().publish(label='B')
D = data('system.memory.usage', filter=filter('state', 'slab_reclaimable') and filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm')).sum().publish(label='D')
E = data('system.memory.usage', filter=filter('state', 'slab_unreclaimable') and filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm')).sum().publish(label='E')

chart.name: Hosts With Agent Installed
chart.programText: A = data('cpu.utilization', filter=filter('cloud.platform', 'azure_vm'), rollup='average').count().publish(label='A')
